tool.name: NewSatelliteField
tool.summary:
Creates new satellite fields from a layer from ToC. The process will create one satellite field for each feature in the layer. A column with the name of each geometry is required it will be used as the field ID.

The created area of interest will be continuously monitored forever.
tool.usage:
Select the layer with the geometries to be used as satellite fields. Select the layer column that contains the field/geometry names to be used as the field ID in Leaf. If there is a duplicated or invalid name it will be ignored, same if there is already a registered field with the same name.

Inform the provider, that it can be "sentinel" for Sentinel-2 images or "planet" for Planet Scope images (this one requires special permission first).

You can also select the start date when Leaf will start to fetch images, it can be 5 years in the past.

Execute the tool and Leaf will start to monitor the images and get and process them as soon they are available in the provider.
